title: Netlify
description:
### About the app

The Netlify app makes creating and updating content on your site easier. The app removes the need to navigate between platforms, giving editors full control of everything from previewing to deploying changes. Content writers and editors can trigger Netlify builds with one click in the sidebar. 

See build status in real-time, track progress and view recent changes all from within the web app. 


---

### What you can do with the Netlify app: 

- Trigger Netlify builds with one click in the sidebar
- Display build status so editors don't preview outdated sites
- Bring Netlify functionality into the Contentful web app
- Configure on a per-content-type level 

### Requirements:

- A static site based on a static site generator such as Gatsby, Middleman or Hugo
- Your site configured to load content from Contentful and its code pushed to a remote repository, such as GitHub or Gitlab
- A Netlify setup where the site is connected to the remote repository and enabled for continuous deployment

---

### Screenshots

![Netlify config](//images.ctfassets.net/lpjm8d10rkpy/4Rf8yoGPw4AQwdMboiVwhF/a0a9a8b8e73a5ace1fdf78adebc24a49/apps-netlify-site-setup.b4a24a69c0.png)

![Netlify sidebar](//images.ctfassets.net/lpjm8d10rkpy/RrSqXTcdlpfkPt7sJzkEb/57172d0fd3eaa36a5ab90e7d183ed171/apps-netlify-sidebar.0ffd73e12b.png)
tagLine: Easily build and preview sites with the Netlify app

actionList.info: Build widget will be removed from sidebars of all content types
This will not modify your Netlify sites. You may want to remove unneeded deploy notifications and build hooks from your Netlify site.

title: Optimizely
description:
### About the Optimizely app

Optimizely is a leading feature flagging and experimentation platform. The Optimizely app offers a simple way to run experiments with content, helping you make smarter data-backed decisions. Marketers can optimize content, obtain better insights, and iterate continuously without leaving Contentful. 


---

### Features:

- Run A/B tests or multivariate tests on structured content (copy, components, layouts and pages)
- Marketers donâ€™t have to be dependent on developers to lead experimentation 
- Reduce the amount of manual work needed to set up experiments


---

### Installation:

Installing this app will:

- Create a new content type called "Variation Container" 
- Create "Variation Container" entries
- Read your projects, experiments and variations from Optimizely

---

### Requirements:

- An Optimizely full stack plan with access to the REST API

---

### Screenshots:

![Optimizely editor](//images.ctfassets.net/lpjm8d10rkpy/6BKTGsRNAzlQgllHDclqYe/ad9bad07083d102d1deff54a6a62e57f/optimizely-editor.png)
tagLine: Enable experimentation at scale with the Optimizely app

actionList.info: This will not remove the variation container content type or any created entries. Please remove them manually if they are no longer needed.

title: Gatsby Cloud
description:
### About the app
The Gatsby app offers a fast and easy way to preview content changes on your website directly from Contentful. Editors can feel confident about their changes before they are live. 

---

### What you can do with the Gatsby app: 

- Preview a build of a Gatsby site
- Trigger a manual build of a Gatsby site


---

### Screenshots
![Gatsby cloud](//images.ctfassets.net/lpjm8d10rkpy/1zISSOxs4Cm0cIDPsbf1FV/7815345d53a95a0934c9bcc39829f9c5/gatsby-preview.png)
tagLine: Instantly see content changes on your website with the Gatsby app

actionList.info: This will remove the Gatsby Cloud widget from the sidebar
This will not delete your Gatsby Cloud instance

title: Cloudinary
description:
### About the Cloudinary app 

Link your Cloudinary asset library with Contentful to make the publishing process quick and seamless for your content editors. 

The Cloudinary widget allows editors to easily select digital media from their Cloudinary account without leaving the Contentful web app. 

---

### Features:

- Directly link your assets on Cloudinary in your Contentful entries
- Browse your asset collection on Cloudinary
- Preview selected assets in Contentful
- Standard JSON based asset reference format

---

### Requirements:

To use this app, you will need:

- An account with Cloudinary
- Your Cloudinary account cloud name 

---

### Screenshots:

![Cloudinary dialog](//images.ctfassets.net/lpjm8d10rkpy/4QAxpe5mbLZWkTAWucplJ4/1155818e1422f30fac24a51aab302670/apps-cloudinary-dialog.png)
tagLine: Seamlessly deliver images and videos with the Cloudinary app

title: Bynder
description:
### About the Bynder app 

The Bynder app allows editors to select media from their Bynder account without leaving Contentful. Design and marketing teams can easily access their most recent assets. 

Simply click __Select__ or __Upload__ a file on Bynder and select the assets you want to be referenced in your entry.

---

### Features:

- Link your assets on Bynder from your Contentful entries
- Browse your asset collection on Bynder
- Preview selected assets in Contentful

---

### Requirements:

To use this app, you will need:

- An account with Bynder
- The URL of your Bynder account
- A content type with a field of type JSON object to hold the references to Bynder

---

### Screenshots:
![apps-bynder-dialog](//images.ctfassets.net/lpjm8d10rkpy/36TMeTeEpwqraMSTldDeVH/3ed9980af3eb5318d5631c3c6ef3e5f3/apps-bynder-dialog.png)
tagLine: Find and use brand, marketing and product assets from your Bynder library

title: Dropbox
description:
### About the Dropbox app 

The Dropbox app lets users select any media or file from a personal or shared Dropbox account and attach it to an entry in Contentful.  

Simply click __Select__ or __Upload__ a file on Dropbox and select the assets you want to be referenced from your entry. 

---

### Features:

- Link your assets in Dropbox to your Contentful entries 
- Browse your Dropbox account
- Preview selected assets in Contentful

---

### Requirements:

To use this app, you will need:

- An account with [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com)

---

### Screenshots:

![Dropbox screenshot](//images.ctfassets.net/lpjm8d10rkpy/5uQPU1n35hheQmxg7CeMfx/95355daf5e17e7384e45ca37923722e3/Screen_Shot_2019-11-13_at_15.04.34.png?w=1000)
tagLine: Connect Contentful and Dropbox to easily share content
